artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Nishinomiya Shinroku
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
marks: 五渡亭國貞画 {Gototei Kunisada ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Center sheet of a triptych. Related to the play Date moyô gedatsu no Kinugawa 伊達模様解脱絹川, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1821, third month.
title: The Actor Segawa Kikunojō V as Ashikaga Yorikane
